issue.subject: Copy an order at any time (any status)
issue.description:
This was discussed in the initial Workshop in 2013, but not yet implemented, it has been ported as it was in v2:

A user should be able to copy an order (place all of the currently available products in the basket again) whatever the status of the order is.

EDIT: The feature has not been ported at all. It has to be fully re-implemented.

2015-07-09 EDIT specs with Hélène:

* Add an action button in orders lists "order again" that will:
** Copy all products in basket
** Copy all products properties in basket
** Copy perimeters in basket
** Copy name + append " - copy" (translatable string)
** Copy third party + third party fields (ref, contact, email)
* This copy is formed in a besket in session
* If there is existing products and perimeters in basket:
** ask for confirmation before copy
** if confirmed, drop existing basket content and replace with the copy

custom_fields.name: Functional impact
custom_fields.value: Allow users to copy an order(whatever its status) to the basket.

custom_fields.name: Ergonomic impact
custom_fields.value: In the "Actions" section, add an "Order again" entry.
